description: Epic: eliminate exec.Command("git") calls that slow down every bw invocation. The two on the hot path are findGitDir() (rev-parse --git-common-dir) and gitUserName() (config user.name). Secondary: remove legacy worktree cleanup, fix stale execGit comment. Network operations (fetch/push/ls-remote) stay on git CLI due to macOS SSH/Keychain limitations.
title: Remove git binary from startup path
